channel.title: How to stop this un-equiping your items?
channel.description: In My funpk arena, after you die, it un-equips your items. But you don't lose them, unless you don't have space. How can I change it to not un-equip your items?

item.title: How to stop this un-equiping your items?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Good point.

Any other suggestions?

item.source: How to stop this un-equiping your items?

item.title: How to stop this un-equiping your items?
item.dc:creator: @crackheadKD crackheadKD
item.description:
@crackheadKD wrote:

[code] if (currentHealth < 1) {
currentHealth = 0;
}
if (currentHealth == 0) {
for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
try {
int item = playerEquipment[r];

                if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
                    remove(item, r);
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment");
            }
        }
        for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
            try {
                if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
                    deleteItem(playerItems[rr] - 1,
                            getItemSlot(playerItems[rr] - 1), 1); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {}
        }
        removeAllItems();
        teleportToX = HOME;
        teleportToY = HOME;
        // pEmote = 15;
        // pWalk = 13;
        sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");
        setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]);
        currentHealth = 99;
        hitDiff = 0;	
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    }[/code] Try figuring out where to put that, tbh I'm not going to be bothered to tell you where and how to add it in because I can spend all day long explaining it.. Use your common sense..

Where it says ‘HOME’ put your home coords.

Read full topic
